title: Ranked Season
body: I got gold before the season ended (Nov 7), right now (Nov 9) ranked is still open. Im wondering what will happen if I play ranked games right now? Will I lose lp, gain lp or will my lp stay the same? Im asking this question because im (Gold 5, 0 lp). I don't wanna lose a game and get demoted to silver right before they hand out victorious graves, thanks!

replies.body: Ranked season is over, so any game you play right now  won't impact your rewards at all!
